cgcloud__Update_Activation__c.name: cgcloud__Update_Activation__c
cgcloud__Update_Activation__c.description: This custom setting defines the sales org-specific update activation record to make sure that maintenance is only possible by using the Update Activation page.

cgcloud__Activation_Date__c.description: Activation date of the update or feature.

cgcloud__Activation_Release__c.description: Release version that will automatically enable the feature.

cgcloud__Identifier__c.description: Identifier of the update or feature.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Name of the sales org for which the record is used.
